data.text:
Abana

Abana is a city in Kastamonu, in Turkey.

GPS Coordinates of Abana, Kastamonu, Turkey

Abana is located on the latitude of 41.97858 and longitude of 34.011 and has a geohash of sz2nvcyncwrx.

Cities and Towns near Abana

The nearest significant population center from Abana is Bozkurt in Kastamonu, Turkey, located 2 kilometers or 1 miles ↓ S of the city. Other locations in close proximity include Çatalzeytin (Kastamonu, Turkey) located 16 km (10 mi) → E and İnebolu (Kastamonu, Turkey) located 20 km (12 mi) ↙ SW of Abana.

In total, we found 19 cities near Abana in our database.

Power Plants near Abana

We found a total of 1 utility scale power plants in close proximity of Abana.
